item.title: Customizing Rails console with Pry!
item.description: If you are working with Rails, chances are you have already used pry in your rails project. In this post, I will show how to customize pry for more productivity. If you are not using pry yet, it’s easy to start using pry with rails console. We can add the following gem in our Gemfile and run bundle install. group :development, :test do gem 'pry-rails' end Now, it will open pry whenever we open rails console.
